description: The night before, we got hit with a snowstorm, so we figured why not go have some fun. We loaded up the cars and headed up Mount Shasta – such an awesome place. The guys let loose and had some fun climbing up and sledding down. Robbie was the real daredevil of the group and almost hit a few rocks and crashed a few hundred times. Back at the house, they loaded into the hot tub and got things heated up for Winter Getaway Day 8.
title: Winter Getaway: Day 8
